title: Baahubali: The Beginning
description: A young man's journey to reclaim his kingdom from his evil uncle, featuring epic battles and stunning visuals.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
description: The epic conclusion of the Baahubali saga, revealing the truth behind the kingdom's fall and the hero's quest for justice.

title: RRR
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Ram Charan
description: A fictional story about two Indian revolutionaries, their friendship and their fight against British colonial rule.

title: Pushpa: The Rise
description: A story of a coolie who rises to become a powerful sandalwood smuggler, facing numerous challenges along the way.

title: Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo
description: A man discovers he was switched at birth and must navigate his new life in a wealthy family while dealing with corporate politics.

title: Sye Raa Narasimha Reddy
description: The story of Uyyalawada Narasimha Reddy, one of the first freedom fighters in India against British rule.

title: Sarileru Neekevvaru
description: An army officer visits a small town to help a colleague's family and ends up fighting against corruption.

title: Maharshi
description: A successful businessman returns to his roots to help farmers and transform agriculture in his village.

title: Bharat Ane Nenu
description: A young man becomes the Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh and fights against corruption and political challenges.

title: Rangasthalam
description: Set in the 1980s, a hearing-impaired man fights against a corrupt village president to bring justice to his people.

title: Arjun Reddy
description: A brilliant but self-destructive surgeon's journey through love, loss, and redemption.

title: Jersey
description: A failed cricketer decides to make a comeback at the age of 36 to fulfill his son's wish.

title: Eega
description: A man reincarnates as a housefly to seek revenge on his murderer.

title: Magadheera
description: A story of reincarnation and eternal love spanning across 400 years.

title: Pokiri
description: An undercover cop's mission to bring down a powerful crime syndicate.

title: Gabbar Singh
description: A remake of Dabangg, following a fearless cop's fight against corruption.

title: Attarintiki Daredi
description: A wealthy businessman's grandson goes undercover as a driver to reunite his grandfather with his estranged daughter.

title: Yevadu
description: A man with a new face seeks revenge while protecting a woman from dangerous criminals.

title: Manam
description: A heartwarming story of reincarnation and family bonds spanning across three generations.

description: A young man's quest to end a long-standing feud between two villages.

description: The continuation of Rocky's story as he faces new challenges in his quest for power.
